oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran William Daniel Thompson with his family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Confederate veteran William Daniel Thompson, who served as 1st sergeant for Co. I, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, poses with his wife Caroline, his children, including George Ramsey, and their families. Thompson kept a diary during the war [wmca072]. The collection includes images of his brother [wmca074], his father [wmca075] and his wife [wmca076].
